content: KWIK HUS Screw anchor Premium screw anchor for permanent fastenings or reusable temporary fastenings in concrete or masonry (carbon steel, hex head) ### Categories: Home > Products > Fasteners > Mechanical anchors- - - ### FEATURES:Features Time-saving and easy to install with no need for accurate torque Tested and evaluated according to AC 193 for uncracked concrete and AC 106 for grout-filled CMU blocks (for sizes 3/8 and bigger) Optimized thread design for best-in-class setting performance and superior load values For use with standard ANSI-tolerance drill bits – no special close-tolerance drill bits required Fully-removable screw anchoring solution Applications Glazing, windows and storefronts Racking and shelving Attaching ledgers Installing inside railings Attaching formwork and tilt-up braces, sill plates, perimeter walls ### TECHNICAL DATA: Material, corrosion: Carbon steel, zinc-plated Head configuration: Hex head Base materials: Concrete (uncracked), Masonry (grout-filled CMU) Technical Data | Material, corrosion | Carbon steel, zinc-plated | Head configuration | Hex head | Base materials | Concrete (uncracked), Masonry (grout-filled CMU) | Type of fixing | Through-fastening | Reusable (and removable) | Yes | Cleaning procedures | Manual Cleaning | PROFIS Software | Yes | Installation direction | All | Material composition | Steel, zinc-plated (min. 8 µm) ### ITEMS- 434441 -
